definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: Chapter Five analyses the creative features of new scenarios of Shanghai"s Peking Opera."
sentences.chinese: 第五章則是對上海京劇新編劇本創作特點的分析。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang Xingfa, a famous Beijing Opera actor, is invited to give us an introduction to the art of Beijing opera.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請到著名京劇演員姜興發老師講授京劇藝術。

sentences.english: Mr. Jiang Xingfa, a famous Beijing Opera actor, is invited to give us an introduction to the art of Beijing opera.
sentences.chinese: 我們邀請到著名京劇演員姜興發老師講授京劇藝術。

sentences.english: There is a museum of the Beijing Opera art.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個京劇藝術博物館。

sentences.english: Peking Opera in China has a history of approximately 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 京劇在中國約有200年曆史，它是北京的地方戲。

sentences.english: In early days, women were forbidden to enter theatres, so all Peking Opera performers were men.
sentences.chinese: 早時婦女不準進劇場，所以京劇演員都是男的。

sentences.english: Peking Opera, a comprehensive form of stage art, is a well-known cultural symbol of China.
sentences.chinese: 京劇是我國的國粹之一，是一種舞臺藝術的綜合表現。

sentences.english: Tibetan Opera has over 600-year-history. That is longer than the history of Peking Opera.
sentences.chinese: 藏戲的產生早於京劇，至今已有六百多年的歷史。

sentences.english: Dad and I are going to see a Beijing Opera show this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我和爸爸今天下午打算去看場京劇。

sentences.english: Xiao Gang's brother plays the male role in the county opera troupe.
sentences.chinese: 小剛的哥哥是縣京劇團的小生演員。

sentences.english: It is the national opera of our country.
sentences.chinese: 京劇是我們國家的國劇。

sentences.english: Well-selected Beijing operas for your enjoyment .
sentences.chinese: 精選的京劇，京劇愛好者的聽覺享受。

sentences.english: Well-selected Beijing operas for your enjoyment .
sentences.chinese: 精選的京劇，京劇愛好者的聽覺享受。

sentences.english: So I can study Peking Opera and spend a lot of time in the theater.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我就可以學京劇，並且花很多時間看戲了。

sentences.english: Now I'd like to present the world's greatest Peking opera singer to you.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我向大家介紹世界上最偉大的京劇演員。

definition: type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
Mei Lanfang (1894-1961), famous master of Beijing opera, specialist in female roles

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
